name: Liquid Loop (Alpha v0.15)
description:
Water is life, and for you, quite literally.

Play as Lucifer MorningDew, a raindrop cast down from the heavens fighting your way back through any path you choose in a world that seems vast to your tiny self.  Use a variety of different weapons and abilities, unlocking more as you complete quests, help other characters and take down nefarious bosses
